title: 28 days balding guarantee
body:
Scam product, waste of money. 
I would rate it a negetive star, but there's no option.
‚Ä¢ My hair started falling even more.
‚Ä¢ Even after a week it started falling more and more. The hair fall only increased with each use. ‚Ä¢ And I don't even have any hormonal or allergic issues. Still had the worst experience ever with the this product.
‚Ä¢ It should literally be tagged as "28 days balding guarantee".  
‚Ä¢ And the smell OMG. It smells awful. And they claim it's non sticky. Well let me clarify, have you ever seen a mucosal drying ? The surface feels exactly like that after it's dried. It's sticky when you apply and it's stiffens the hair near the scalp when it dries. 
‚Ä¢ This product is just a big scam, they're paying all these people to post about it. Just think none of these influencers show empty bottles or multiple bottle usage. They'll just shampoo and style their hair and show that it's the result after using this serum. And they'll show their dirty or 3rd day after wash scalp and say that was before. Everyone knows after shampoo hair looks fuller. This serum is the biggest scam ever. I feel so bad and disheartened seeing my hair fall of even more.

title: Hairfall started from first use
body:
I tried returning packed products and there was no option for return or refund. I faced hair fall right from the first use and I had to stop using it the 3rd day. And right after that it went back to normal.
Kindly take your packed products back, I would not like to use them. Also please improve your after sales service. Atleast leave a customer care number on your website.
location: Delhi, National Capital Territory of Delhi, India

title: Must try !!!
body: I usually deal with dry, frizzy hair that worsens during the monsoon, and hairfall is also a concern for me. I'm very selective about my hair products because of this. Recently, I tried this shampoo without oil my hair and paired it with the matching conditioner, and the results were impressive. After just one use, my hair felt softer, smoother, and much more manageable. If anyone is considering this product, I'd definitely recommend giving it a try. Also, for even better results, don‚Äôt forget to use a serum!

title: 28 days balding guarantee
body:
Scam product, waste of money. I would rate it a negetive star, but there's no option.
 ‚Ä¢ My hair started falling even more.
 ‚Ä¢ Even after a week it started falling more and more. The hair fall only increased with each use. 
‚Ä¢ And I don't even have any hormonal or allergic issues. Still had the worst experience ever with the this product. 
‚Ä¢ It should literally be tagged as "28 days balding guarantee".
 ‚Ä¢ And the smell OMG. It smells awful. And they claim it's non sticky. Well let me clarify, have you ever seen a mucosal drying ? The surface feels exactly like that after it's dried. It's sticky when you apply and it's stiffens the hair near the scalp when it dries.
 ‚Ä¢ This product is just a big scam, they're paying all these people to post about it. Just think none of these influencers show empty bottles or multiple bottle usage. They'll just shampoo and style their hair and show that it's the result after using this serum. And they'll show their dirty or 3rd day after wash scalp and say that was before. Everyone knows after shampoo hair looks fuller. This serum is the biggest scam ever. I feel so bad and disheartened seeing my hair fall of even more.

I have been using the product for about a month now and the product is amazing the only probable issue I am facing is that.. the pump of the product doesn't work well, when I push it down, the product kinda leaks which makes it little difficult and messy to use... but I the serum works great :)

title: A dandruff solution that really work
body:
I‚Äôve struggled with dandruff for years, trying countless products that never fully delivered on their promises‚Äîuntil I discovered Pilgrim‚Äôs Australian Tea Tree Anti-Dandruff solution. 

This product is a game-changer!After just a few uses, my scalp felt soothed, and the flakes started to disappear. It‚Äôs gentle yet effective, with a refreshing tea tree scent that I love. My scalp feels healthier, and my hair is softer and more manageable than ever before.I‚Äôm so grateful to have found a product that finally works for me. If you‚Äôre dealing with dandruff, this is the solution you‚Äôve been looking for. Highly recommend!

Thank you, Pilgrim, for creating such a fantastic product!

location: Delhi, National Capital Territory of Delhi, India

title: The bestest matte lipsticks ever
body: I've 4 shades & each stands out. Flirty Rose, Wine Spill, Berry Tease and Mauve Desire. Flirty Rose is my fav rosy nude pink suited for all skin tones, Flirty Rose works wonderfully for office or a day out, it's basically a no brainer. The formula is lightweight & lasting, colours are deep & rich, an absolute delight for matt lipstick lovers. Wine Spill is another lovely night shade, it immediately brightens my face. Mauve Desire is a subtle lilac shade with a hint of pink that will work wonderfully with loud makeup and also for the office. Berry Tease is another sophisticated mix of brown + maroon. I love all my Pilgrim lipsticks, I'll buy more.

title: Overpowering Fragrance
body: The fragrance is too strong for my preference. I usually don't mind fragrance in my products as my skin is not sensitive and doesn't breakout. But this serum has a very very strong fragrance and I could smell it all during the day when I applied it on my face. After a while the strong fragrance became nauseating and I just wanted to wash it off to get rid off the scent. I finished it by using it on my body. I definitely won't repurchase it unless Pilgrim comes up with a non-scented version. You may want to consider purchasing it only if you have a very good tolerance to strong fragrances and scents.

title: Fraudster Call
body: I received a call from someone claiming to be from Pilgrim India. The caller mentioned that I had been selected to choose an item from a list of gifts, including a TV, washing machine, and others. I found this suspicious and asked them to send me the details via email. I then ended the call. I am concerned about how the caller knew about my previous purchase from Pilgrim India during the last sale. It seems like a breach of customer information. I suspect that someone within Pilgrim India may be involved. Customer confidentiality should be maintained and this kind of breach damages trust. I am considering filing a cybercrime complaint against the company for selling customer data without consent. Customers affected by this breach should be compensated for the inconvenience caused

title: CAUTION: SEVERE ALLERGIC REACTION AND RASHES
body:
PLEASE DO A PATCH TEST BEFORE USE!!

After using the hair serum on my hair at night as per the directions on the bottle, the next evening my scalp started itching very intensely. I then developed very severe full body rashes as an allergic reaction, that became worse as the days progressed. Washing my hair to remove the serum helped only a little as the rashes still continued to develop, though with less severity. This allergic reaction has now continued for almost a week and I am on medication (it is getting better). 

I have used a couple other Pilgrim products without much issue but this is the first time a skincare /haircare product has affected me, and that too this severely. The patch test is an ABSOLUTE MUST for this product, if not for all others too.

title: 10% Vitamin C Face Serum
body: I enjoy using Pilgrim's Products. Aside from Pilgrim's 10% Vitamin C face serum, I've been using their other skin and hair care products too. I haven't observed any negative side effects from any of the products I've tried so far, but the 10% Vitamin C Face Serum caused severe skin irritation, itching, and burning. On the third day of using this serum, I developed hive-like patches on my face and neck. For two days, I couldn't take my hands off my face due to the terrible burning and discomfort. My skin became really dry after applying the vitamin C serum. Only after three full days has the irritation eased, leaving my face flaky and extremely dry. I guess this serum is really strong, so if you are someone with a senstive skin like mine, I'd suggest you take it easy and use the serum every alternate day and allow your skin some time to get used to the ingredients in the 10% Vitamin C Face Serum

title: Misleading Promotion with Overvalued "Jute Bag" Gift
body: The 'Jute bag' gift as part of my purchase, was heavily promoted as a high-value item (as if its worth 599 rupees). However, its not worth even 50 rupees. There are very large sturdy jute bags in the market for less than 100 rupees. Your jute bag is grossly overpriced‚Äîmore than 15 times its worth. It‚Äôs disappointing to see such misleading promotions, where an item of minimal value is marketed as a premium offering. Customers deserve transparency and honesty, not inflated claims. This kind of approach only harms trust in the brand. I hope Pilgrim reconsiders such practices and prioritizes genuine value over exaggerated marketing.

title: I Loved This Product üòò
body:
I'm a great fan of vitamin c serums, I bought this serum for my mom but as I didn't get my serums and creams from my hostel, I stated using this serum just for 1 week and the magic happen I saw a huge difference on my face, this serum is mind-blowing,it reduces dark spots, uneven skin tone,and it gave me a good glow. I loved it and now I ordered it for myself. 

my only concern is last time when I ordered I received only 1 bottle of serum instead of 2 , just because I was having the video of unboxing my parcel, I immediately reported the issue with the video to customer support and I got back another bottle within 2 days, Thank you customer support team. 
I kindly request the pilgrim parcel team not repeat this issue again.

Thank you pilgrim ü•∞

title: Worst brand
body: I wish I could get my money back, I guess I want in my right mind when I started ordering from this fraudulent brand. They offer you discounts and deals just to lure you into their trap of fraud. Also guys I'm gonna be honest with y'all and ask you to not to trust these reviews by verified customers or users. I've their customer for few months a bought products over 5k and everytime I expected the product quality to be better. It never failed to disappoint me. I ordered serum for clarifying skin and acne, both worked at shit nothing changed. The texture of the serum are too thin which makes it nothing but water. I also bought sunscreen it was like a medical cream with texture like dry paste on contrary to which it's supposed be to little liquified to ensure the moisture on skin as well. I ordered a scrub which was worth 500+ something and doesn't even produce lather, doesn't clarify skin or whatsoever. On top of that I tried their newly launched perfume named "Alpha" it has worst nozzle ever and the fragrance fades away in about 10-20 mins. Honestly I held no grudges against this brand nor I'm getting paid. But they really made me their hater after at these. I recommend you to buy test products before spending too much on this brand.

title: Love the quality but a little disappointed with color variation from what was shown in website pics
body:
1. Berry Tease ( In website's picture the colour is so beautiful, something like dark onion color. But in real it is dark burgundy which is also good but it's different than what's shown )
2. Sexy Scarlet (looks a bit reddish in the picture in the website, but in real it is pinkish, we can call it dark pink or ruby red)
3. Wine Spill ( This looks a little similar to what's shown in website thankfully )


Apart from color variations, I love the product, the matte finish, yet the creamy feel. And stays for very long time, it is really smudge proof. That's the reason I choose Pilgrim over others. The quality is awesome üî•

I recently ordered two lipsticks from Pilgrim,(Berry tease,flirty rose) and I must say, the colors are beautiful and the matte finish is impressive. The lipsticks feel slightly heavy on the lips, but it‚Äôs very subtle. They take about 2-3 minutes to completely dry, which is manageable.

However, I noticed a difference in the packaging. The lipstick I purchased had excellent packaging and was brand new. But the second lipstick, which was part of the buy-one-get-one-free offer, did not have proper packaging. It left me a bit confused and disappointed, as it didn‚Äôt match the quality of the first one.

While I appreciate the free offer, I would have liked the same level of care for both products. Overall, the quality of the lipsticks is good, but I hope Pilgrim ensures consistent packaging for all their items in the future.

title: Misleading Buy One Get One Offer
body:
Rating: 2/5

I recently placed an order  after seeing a "Buy One Get One Free" offer. However, when I received my order, I was disappointed to find that the both product was a tiny sample-sized bottle, not the full-sized product I was expecting.

The offer was misleading, and I felt cheated. I would have appreciated it if the website had clearly indicated that the free product would be a sample size.

The product itself is good, but the misleading offer has left a sour taste. I hope the company will be more transparent with their promotions in the future.

title: Worst service
body:
ChatGPT

You said:
Please correct the below scenario 
Order placed on 13/12/24, delivery promised on 17/12/2024.. that status mentioned out for delivery and marked consinee not available at home around 11.27pm, (I don't know whether I went to some heaven and all), next day followed with customer service they said, they will deliver next day but again same procedure with delivery point, third today they promised to deliver but again same scenario continue, no solution... simply they are telling we will refund once courier guy cancelled, I paid upfront and waiting for my product and chat with customer service -common man
ChatGPT said:
ChatGPT
Here‚Äôs a corrected and clearer version of your scenario:

"I placed an order on 13/12/2024, with a promised delivery date of 17/12/2024. On the scheduled delivery day, the status showed 'Out for delivery' but was marked as 'Consignee not available at home' at 11:27 PM. I have no idea how that‚Äôs possible, as I was home the whole time.

The next day 18/12/24, I followed up with customer service, and they assured me the delivery would happen that day. However, the same issue repeated ‚Äî the delivery wasn‚Äôt made, and the status claimed I wasn‚Äôt available.

On the third day, customer service promised the product would be delivered at 20/12/24, but once again, the same situation occurred. Now they‚Äôre simply telling me that I‚Äôll get a refund once the courier cancels the order.

I paid upfront for this product and have been patiently waiting, only to deal with these repetitive excuses and no proper resolution. Chatting with customer service feels like talking to a wall. This is extremely frustrating!"

title: delivers on its promises
body:
I recently tried the Pilgrim AHA BHA Face Peeling Solution, and I must say, it delivers on its promises! Here are my thoughts after using it:
Right from the first use, my skin felt noticeably clearer. It exfoliated deeply, removing dead skin cells and impurities effectively. It smoothened my skin's texture remarkably well and visibly softened fine lines and wrinkles. This solution works wonders on stubborn blackheads and whiteheads, leaving the skin free of congestion. 
My skin appeared smooth, radiant, and rejuvenated after every use. It's like a mini facial in a bottle!

Suggestion for Packaging
While the product itself is amazing, I found the dropper application quite messy and inconvenient. It tends to get tricky once you start applying, and precision becomes a challenge. I strongly recommend Pilgrim consider including a brush applicator instead of a dropper. A brush would make application more hygienic, seamless, and user-friendly.


This peeling solution is a game-changer for anyone looking to exfoliate, clarify, and refine their skin. Just a tweak in the applicator, and it would be a flawless product! Definitely worth a try for clear, smooth, and radiant skin.

title: Refund for unsatisfied results
body:
Hello,
I am writing this review after using the product for 60 days. I have been applying the moisturizer every alternate day, but unfortunately, it hasn‚Äôt met my expectations. The main issue is that it doesn‚Äôt absorb into the skin properly and leaves behind white patches, which is quite irritating. Initially, I thought this might be due to my skin type, but I shared the product with my sister and mother, and they experienced the same issue.

I would like to request a refund for the moisturizer as it hasn‚Äôt performed as advertised. It feels like a waste of money, offering no satisfaction. However, I must add that the serum from your range was excellent.

I hope you will consider my feedback and process a refund for the cream. Thank you for your understanding.
